txt.en: 'This place is a treasure untapped. Soon the ore will be flowing out of the hills like water!'
'Hannar's leadership is as steadfast as the mountain. He will see us through.'
'I'm on one of my few respites from working the mine. I do not mind though...digging is more pleasure than work.'
'I feel awful for the guards, never getting to work the mines always having to be above ground....'
